data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 6, Elche will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Real Sociedad.
Free kick for Elche in their own half.
Alexander Isak (Real Sociedad) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 7, Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
Tete Morente of Elche gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Elche.
In the minute 13, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Elche throw-in in Real Sociedad's half.
Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad in the half of Elche.
In the minute 16, Alexander Isak of Real Sociedad smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
Real Sociedad's Alexander Isak gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Elche defender.
In the minute 18, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards Elche a goal kick.
Elche's Josan is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in Elche.
In the minute 22, Real Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
Can Real Sociedad get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elche's half?
Real Sociedad are whistled for offside.
In the minute 24, Real Sociedad's Mikel Oyarzabal breaks free at Estadio Martínez Valero. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
In Elche, Mikel Oyarzabal of Real Sociedad is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 26, In Elche a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Real Sociedad drive upfield and David Silva gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Elche defender.
Mikel Merino (Real Sociedad) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 27, Throw-in high up the field for Real Sociedad in Elche.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Real Sociedad to take a throw-in in Elche territory.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Elche in the half of Real Sociedad.
Miguel Cifuentes is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 32, Elche to take a throw-in in Real Sociedad territory.
Can Elche get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Sociedad's half?
Jorge Almiron (Elche) has taken off Miguel Cifuentes who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Nino is the replacement.
In Elche Elche attack through Raul Guti. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 33, Goal kick for Real Sociedad at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Elche are caught offside.
In the minute 35, Free kick Real Sociedad.
Omenuke Mfulu (Elche) gets a yellow card.
Alexander Isak (Real Sociedad) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 36, Elche have a goal kick.
Real Sociedad's Mikel Merino gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
In the minute 37, Real Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Real Sociedad throw-in in Elche's half.
Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Real Sociedad in the half of Elche.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Real Sociedad just outside Elche's area.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Elche.
In the minute 43, David Silva is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Elche at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Real Sociedad have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, Important block from the Elche defence as Ander Guevara fires in a strike for Real Sociedad.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad close to the penalty box.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Elche.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio Martínez Valero.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a throw-in for Real Sociedad, close to Elche's area.
Real Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
Real Sociedad push forward at Estadio Martínez Valero and Robin Le Normand gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Elche defence.
In the minute 50, In Elche a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Elche needs to be cautious. Real Sociedad have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
In the minute 53, It's a goal kick for the home team in Elche.
Alexander Isak (Real Sociedad) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Elche, Mikel Merino (Real Sociedad) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Real Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Portu.
In the minute 55, Mikel Merino instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 57, Real Sociedad to take a throw-in in Elche territory.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Real Sociedad throw-in in Elche's half.
Can Real Sociedad get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elche's half?
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards Elche a goal kick.
Elche have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Real Sociedad in the half of Elche.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Elche.
In the minute 66, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a throw-in for Real Sociedad, close to Elche's area.
Free kick for Elche in their own half.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad close to the penalty box.
In the minute 68, Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 68, Adnan Januzaj is replacing Portu for Real Sociedad at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Imanol Alguacil is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Martínez Valero with Ander Barrenetxea replacing Mikel Oyarzabal.
The away team have replaced Alexander Isak with Jon Bautista. This is the third substitution made today by Imanol Alguacil.
Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
In the minute 70, Gonzalo Verdu (Elche) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Elche needs to be cautious. Real Sociedad have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 71, Jon Bautista for Real Sociedad gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Elche have a goal kick.
Can Real Sociedad get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elche's half?
In the minute 73, Real Sociedad push forward at Estadio Martínez Valero and David Silva gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Elche defence.
Real Sociedad drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 74, Throw-in high up the field for Elche in Elche.
Elche make their second substitution with Luismi replacing Omenuke Mfulu.
Elche awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Real Sociedad have been given a penalty...
In the minute 77, Adnan Januzaj gives Real Sociedad a 0-2 lead from the penalty spot.
Imanol Alguacil (Real Sociedad) is making a fourth substitution, with Martin Zubimendi replacing Ander Guevara.
Roberto Lopez is on a sub for David Silva for Real Sociedad.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Real Sociedad awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Real Sociedad capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Elche's half?
In the minute 81, Adnan Januzaj (Real Sociedad) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Elche in the half of Real Sociedad.
In the minute 82, Elche have a dangerous throw-in.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Elche.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Real Sociedad in the half of Elche.
Real Sociedad have a dangerous throw-in.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
In the minute 87, Raul Guti (Elche) has received a first yellow card.
Victor Rodriguez is replacing Raul Guti for Elche at Estadio Martínez Valero.
In Elche a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 89, Real Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
Real Sociedad pushes forward through Roberto Lopez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for Elche at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Elche have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Real Sociedad to take a throw-in in Elche territory.
Adnan Januzaj for Real Sociedad gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards Elche a goal kick.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Real Sociedad throw-in in Elche's half.
Important block from the Elche defence as Roberto Lopez fires in a strike for Real Sociedad.
Andoni Gorosabel is back on the pitch.
The match has come to a close in Elche. The final score is 0-3.
The match at Estadio Martínez Valero has been interrupted briefly for a check on Andoni Gorosabel, who is down injured.
Goal! Roberto Lopez extends Real Sociedad's lead to 0-3.
That's a fine assist from Mikel Merino.
